name: py-stevedore
description: Manage Dynamic Plugins for Python Applications.

dependencies.name: py-pbr
dependencies.description:
PBR is a library that injects some useful and sensible default behaviors
into your setuptools run.

dependent_to.name: py-keystoneauth1
dependent_to.description:
This package contains tools for authenticating to an OpenStack-based
cloud

dependent_to.name: py-oslo-config
dependent_to.description:
The Oslo configuration API supports parsing command line arguments and
.ini style configuration files.

dependent_to.name: py-python-keystoneclient
dependent_to.description:
This is a client for the OpenStack Identity API, implemented by the
Keystone team

dependent_to.name: py-virtualenvwrapper
dependent_to.description:
virtualenvwrapper is a set of extensions to Ian Bicking's virtualenv
tool. The extensions include wrappers for creating and deleting virtual
environments and otherwise managing your development workflow, making it
easier to work on more than one project at a time without introducing
conflicts in their dependencies.

dependent_to.name: py-bandit
dependent_to.description: Security oriented static analyser for python code.
